markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 5" pfs="Standard">
[Flame Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=120)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 338 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Tradition**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2)

**Bloodline**
[Angelic](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=2)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

**Area** 10-foot radius,  40-foot-tall cylinder

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** 
[basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex

</row>

</column>

---

You call a rain of divine fire that plummets down from above, dealing 8d6 fire damage. Because the flame is infused with divine energy, creatures in the area apply only half their usual fire resistance. Creatures that are immune to fire, instead of gaining the usual benefit of immunity, treat the results of their saving throws as one degree of success better.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 2d6.
name: Flame Strike

text: Flame Strike Two Actions Source Core Rulebook pg. 338 4.0 Tradition Divine Bloodline Angelic Cast somatic, verbal Range 120 feet Area 10-foot radius, 40-foot-tall cylinder Saving Throw basic Reflex --- You call a rain of divine fire that plummets down from above, dealing 8d6 fire damage. Because the flame is infused with divine energy, creatures in the area apply only half their usual fire resistance. Creatures that are immune to fire, instead of gaining the usual benefit of immunity, treat the results of their saving throws as one degree of success better. --- Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.
